name: Memoria - A memory game collection
description:
Memoria - A memory game collection by Luis Rodriguez

Memoria contains four different memory games, each one designed to test a different kind of memory trait.

Both children and adults are able to train and master these memory traits while playing, and using the scores screen, progress is automatically tracked for you.

Key features

Four memory games:

  • Tower Builder
  • Follow the leader
  • Concentration
  • The Labyrinth

Safe for children to play with:

  • No ads anywhere
  • No tracking of any personal information, just the game scores
  • 100% offline

Options include

  • Two card decks for Concentration
  • Three difficulty levels for The Labyrinth
  • Visual aid for The Labyrinth, to use if you're having trouble keeping track of the objective or the player character
